question: What notable water well is located in the heart of Hail?
true_answer: The notable water well located in the heart of Hail is Bi’r Samah.
asked_question_translated: Jaká pozoruhodná studna se nachází v centru města Hail?
answer: V centru města Hail v Saúdské Arábii se nachází pozoruhodná Al-Ekher brána (The Last Door).
answer_translated_eng: In the centre of Hail, Saudi Arabia, is the remarkable Al-Ekher Gate (The Last Door).
